I predict with fear the creation of future monstrous (psycho) Britons through the actions of the Home Office.

British children or children in Britain who cannot be removed from the UK are inadvertently made to suffer because of the immigration status of their parents, carers and loved ones. These British ‘Holy Innocents’, loves their family and hate to see them suffer. They cannot believe what the Home Office/the Government/Britain is doing to them and their love ones. They are fast becoming teenagers and hating Britain – their own country. They are inadvertently being radicalised. Strict Immigration Rules have failed them. Britain has failed them. They are homeless. They have no money.  Although their family cannot be removed from the UK, yet majorities of them still have their immigration application pending at the Home Office year in year out.

We the undersigned urge the Home Office henceforth to consider their applications in the same way as EEA-Nationals.
